text.title: Have Swag As a Kid
text.head: Have Swag As a Kid
text.p: Are you a kid who wants to have swag? It is a simple process, luckily, as long as you believe that the only way to have swag is that described in this article. Read on from step one to have swag as kid according to the contributors to this article.
text.head: Steps

list.item: Wear colors that compliment each other, and you as well. Wear black and white, wear navy and cream, try any swag-ish colors together.
Play some sports. Football, rugby and basketball are swag sports. If you play sports, you might even meet some new friends!
Wear a snap-back or beanie when you feel you'll have swag doing so. Wear a beanie when swimming or a snap-back in bed if you think that gives you swag.
Pick clothes with a pattern: plaid, striped or graphic shirts. Wear green/blue/grey camo pants and a shirt at any appropriate time.

Get a matching snap-back every time you get new clothes. Make sure it has a sticker and don't take the sticker off but do take the price tag off. Get the snap-backs however you think gives you most swag. Buy them, steal them, borrow them or plead with your parents to get them to buy them for you. How you get them doesn't matter, just get a matching snap-back every you buy any new clothes, from a suit to a new pair of underpants.
Dress hipster. Wear brightly colored skinny jeans, but avoid yellow and pink skinny jeans.

Wear sneaker brands like Jordan, Adidas, Nike, and Reebok. If you can't afford those brands of shoes, get Above the Rim, Protégé, And1, South Pole, and Rocawear. You can't have swag without these brands, apparently.
Hang out with friends constantly. Hang out with friends instead of studying, at bedtime, when out with your parents or visiting your gran, if you think it gives you swag.
Don't worry if you have no girlfriend. You do not have to have a girlfriend, but if you want one, be yourself!

Play video games you like, ones such as NBA 2k/Madden or Call of Duty so you could have something to talk about with your friends. Playing video games gives you swag, as long as you don't play video games you do not like.
Practice good hygiene. Brush your teeth everyday, and shower every night and/or morning.
Maintain good grades even if you want to be cool. You won't have a good job if you don't have good grades, possibly.
Don't bully. It's not cool at all! Stand up for someone who is getting bullied, but don't fight-- use a quiet, persuasive tone instead.
Workout a couple of days a week. Remember to give the exercising a rest at least three days each week.
Get some cologne, but don't spray too much. Use it on you body, or spray it on anything else that you think spraying with cologne will give you swag.
Crack some jokes with your friends. Don't talk about other people, though, because it might come back and haunt you.
Don't sag. Just show the elastic band, though, if you want to sag.
Get an edge up with your haircut. Add a Nike sign on the side of your head for style if you want.
